Description_lang: $?pc105366[Specialize further into Decayology if you wish to discover more potion recipes.]?pc105367[You have learned all there is to discover from potion experimentation.][Experiment with volatile reagents in hopes of discovering new potion recipes.]

description_blz.en_US: Experiment with volatile reagents in hopes of discovering new potion recipes.
description_blz.es_MX: Experimenta con componentes volátiles con la esperanza de descubrir nuevas recetas de pociones.
description_blz.pt_BR: Faça experimentos com reagentes voláteis para descobrir novas receitas de poções.
description_blz.de_DE: Experimentiert mit instabilen Reagenzien in der Hoffnung, neue Trankrezepte zu entdecken.
description_blz.en_GB: Experiment with volatile reagents in hopes of discovering new potion recipes.
description_blz.es_ES: Experimenta con componentes volátiles con la esperanza de descubrir nuevas recetas de pociones.
description_blz.fr_FR: Permet de faire des expériences avec des composants instables dans l’espoir de découvrir de nouvelles recettes de potions.
description_blz.it_IT: Sperimenta con reagenti instabili nella speranza di scoprire nuove ricette di pozioni.
description_blz.ru_RU: Позволяет провести эксперимент с нестабильными реагентами, чтобы обнаружить новые рецепты зелий.
description_blz.ko_KR: 새로운 물약 조제법을 알아내려면 불안정한 재료로 실험을 진행해야 합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 進行爆燃材料的相關實驗，期望發現新的藥水配方。
description_blz.zh_CN: 用烈性的原料进行试验，希望发现新的药水配方。
